00072     inline double next() {
00073         switch (t) {
00074         case Ran0: ++ct; return ran0f();
00075         case Ran1: ++ct; return ran1f();
00076         case Gasdev: ++ct; return gasdev();
00077         default: break;
00078         }
00079         return nextBadState(); // for now..
00080     }
00081

00086         default: break;

00089     }

00137 inline double RNG::ran1f() 
00138 {
00139     static const int IA = 16807;
00140     static const int IM = 2147483647;
00141     static const double AM = (1.0/IM);
00142     static const int IQ = 127773;
00143     static const int IR = 2836;
00144     static const int NTAB = 32;
00145     static const int NDIV (1+(IM-1)/NTAB);
00146     static const double EPS = 1.2e-7;
00147     static const double RNMX = (1.0-EPS);
00148     int j;
00149     int k;
00150     double ans;
00151 
00152     if (!iv) {
00153         iv = new int[NTAB];
00154         if (s == 0) s = 1; // disallow 0 s
00155         if (s < 0) s = -s; // force positive s
00156     }
00157     if (s <= 0 || !iy) {
00158         //if (-s < 1) s = 1; // force s of 1 if negative s
00159         //else s = -s; // force s positive
00160         for (j=NTAB+7;j>=0;j--) {
00161             k=(s)/IQ;
00162             s=IA*(s-k*IQ)-IR*k;
00163             if (s < 0) s += IM;
00164             if (j < NTAB) iv[j] = s;
00165         }
00166         iy=iv[0];
00167     }
00168     k=(s)/IQ;
00169     s=IA*(s-k*IQ)-IR*k;
00170     if (s < 0) s += IM;
00171     j=iy/NDIV;
00172     iy=iv[j];
00173     iv[j] = s;
00174     if ((ans = AM*iy) > RNMX) ans = RNMX;
00175     return ans;
00176 }

00178 inline int RNG::ran1i() 
00179 {
00180     static const int IA = 16807;
00181     static const int IM = 2147483647;
00182     static const int IQ = 127773;
00183     static const int IR = 2836;
00184     static const int NTAB = 32;
00185     static const int NDIV (1+(IM-1)/NTAB);
00186     int j;
00187     int k;
00188     int ans;
00189 
00190     if (!iv) {
00191         iv = new int[NTAB];
00192         if (s == 0) s = 1; // disallow 0 s
00193         if (s < 0) s = -s; // force positive s
00194     }
00195     if (s <= 0 || !iy) {
00196         //if (-s < 1) s = 1; // force s of 1 if negative s
00197         //else s = -s; // force s positive
00198         for (j=NTAB+7;j>=0;j--) {
00199             k=(s)/IQ;
00200             s=IA*(s-k*IQ)-IR*k;
00201             if (s < 0) s += IM;
00202             if (j < NTAB) iv[j] = s;
00203         }
00204         iy=iv[0];
00205     }
00206     k=(s)/IQ;
00207     s = IA*(s-k*IQ)-IR*k;
00208     if (s < 0) s += IM;
00209     j = iy/NDIV;
00210     iy=iv[j];
00211     iv[j] = s;
00212     ans = iy;
00213     if (ans < 0) ans += IM;
00214     return ans;
00215 }

00217 inline double RNG::ran0f()
00218 {
00219     static const int IA = 16807;
00220     static const int IM = 2147483647;
00221     static const double AM = (1.0/IM);
00222     static const int IQ = 127773;
00223     static const int IR = 2836;
00224     static const int MASK = 123459876;
00225     int k;
00226     double ans;
00227     
00228     s ^= MASK;
00229     k = (s)/IQ;
00230     s = IA*(s-k*IQ)-IR*k;
00231     if (s < 0) s += IM;
00232     ans = AM * (s);
00233     s ^= MASK;
00234     return ans;
00235 }

00238 {
00239     static const int IA = 16807;
00240     static const int IM = 2147483647;
00241     static const int IQ = 127773;
00242     static const int IR = 2836;
00243     static const int MASK = 123459876;
00244     int k;
00245     int ans;
00246     
00247     s ^= MASK;
00248     k = (s)/IQ;
00249     s = IA*(s-k*IQ)-IR*k;
00250     if (s < 0) s += IM;
00251     ans = s;
00252     s ^= MASK;
00253     return ans;
00254 }
